docs.snippet: Yahoo Inc has bought Blink, a mobile messaging startup whose app lets users send messages that will self-destruct at a time set by the sender....
docs.lead_paragraph: Yahoo Inc has bought Blink, a mobile messaging startup whose app lets users send messages that will self-destruct at a time set by the sender.

headline.main: Yahoo Buys Mobile 'Self-Destruct' Messaging App Blink
headline.print_headline: Yahoo Buys Mobile 'Self-Destruct' Messaging App Blink

docs.snippet: Young women are rebelling against the pressure to be pretty by exaggerating odd facial expressions....
docs.lead_paragraph: Young women are rebelling against the pressure to be pretty by exaggerating odd facial expressions.
docs.abstract: Many young women are rebelling against pressure to look pretty by adopting trend called 'ugly selfies,' in which they post photographs of themselves online with exaggerated or odd facial expressions.

headline.main: With Some Selfies, the Uglier the Better
headline.print_headline: With Some Selfies, the Uglier the Better

docs.snippet: Marketers are taking restrained approaches to advertising in apps to avoid antagonizing users, focusing less on overt promotion....
docs.lead_paragraph: Marketers are taking restrained approaches to advertising in apps to avoid antagonizing users, focusing less on overt promotion.
docs.abstract: Advertising column; companies intent on reaching teens and millenials who are frequent users of messaging apps like Snapchat and WhatsApp face challenge of crafting advertising that promotes their brands but does not antagonize customers; delicate balance has so far led marketers to largely avoid the very personal sphere of messaging.

headline.main: As Messaging Apps Boom, Brands Tiptoe In
headline.print_headline: Brands Take Steps Toward Messaging Apps
